about_the_game:
WARNING!
THIS DLC IS FOR FREE TO PLAY & PREVIOUS DEMO VERSION OWNERS ONLY!
PLEASE NOTE EARLY ACCESS USERS WILL NOT RECEIVE ANY ADDITIONAL CONTENT THROUGH THIS DLC PACKAGE


Metro Conflict: The Origin takes place sometime in the near future where two factions wage war with each other in order to gain dominance over the world. It is a story of mercenaries caught up in the storm of battle.

Included Content
1. 9 Agents
- HAWKEYE: Sniper
- IGOR: SMG/Shotgun/Shield
- TIFFANY: Assault Rifle
- CHRIS: SMG/Shotgun
- ANA: SMG/Shotgun
- TRISH: Sniper
- RONA: Sniper
- EL TIGRE: Assault Rifle
- LOPEZ: Infantry Mortar

2. In game Gold
- 440,000 Gold

name: Metro Conflict: The Origin - FULL AGENTS PACK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 32bit XP(SP3), 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 64bit XP(SP3), 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Metro Conflict: The Origin's 9 additional agent package grants you access to all 12 original characters for full access experience without any need to grind for in-game gold.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
